 2011-13862011-12-01,  ,  ,  HC, 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1603 – Guar Gum and Corrective Amendments)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1603 - GUAR GUM AND CORRECTIVE AMENDMENTS) in order to permit the use of guar gum as a stabilizing agent in standardized bread products at levels consistent with good manufacturing pratice.
